name: Deep Fall (itch) (fire_soldier888)
description:
You are a person who fell into a deep pit, you need to dodge obstacles and get to the core of earth.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 for the theme "Deeper and Deeper"

How to play:

•Move with left & right arrow

Assests from:

•Character from Kenny Platformer Characters: https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-characters

•Stones and bull skeleton from Craftpix.net Free 2D Desert Tileset: https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-2d-rpg-desert-tileset/

•Music from Wowie Resource Pack: https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack
